dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm. And then you've got the WHO saying the virus is contained globally, but then Peter Navarro from the National Economic Council had a more pessimistic take on MSNBC.

dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then there's Paul Krugman writing in The Wall Street Journal, arguing the economic disruption might be less severe than markets are pricing in.

dialogue_turns.text: Which is a bit of a contrast to some experts who are still urging caution, like that New York Times piece saying "panic immediately" despite these minor gains.
